location.zh-cn: 厦门市思明区湖滨北路61号

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国福建省厦门市的地方国家行政机关，是厦门市人民代表大会的执行机关。
description.en: The local state administrative organ of Xiamen City, Fujian Province, People's Republic of China, and the executive organ of the Xiamen Municipal People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，厦门市市长。
description.en: Chinese politician, Mayor of Xiamen.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，厦门市人民政府秘书长。
description.en: Chinese politician, Secretary-General of the Xiamen Municipal People's Government.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军厦门市军事管制委员会

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军厦门市军事管制委员会

description.zh-cn: 1949年解放厦门后成立的军事管制机构，在厦门市人民政府成立前接管了原中国国民党厦门市政府。
description.en: A military control commission established after the liberation of Xiamen in 1949, which took over the former Kuomintang Xiamen Municipal Government before the establishment of the Xiamen Municipal People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国福建省的省级国家行政机关。
description.en: The provincial-level state administrative organ of Fujian Province, People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 厦门市地方国家权力机关。
description.en: The local state power organ of Xiamen City.

nodes.id: 厦门市人民代表大会常务委员会

zh-cn: 厦门市人民代表大会常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 厦门市人民代表大会的常设机关。
description.en: The standing body of the Xiamen Municipal People's Congress.

nodes.id: 中国共产党厦门市委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党厦门市委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在厦门市的地方组织。
description.en: The local organization of the Communist Party of China in Xiamen City.

nodes.id: 中国共产党厦门市人民政府党组

zh-cn: 中国共产党厦门市人民政府党组

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在厦门市人民政府中设立的领导机构。
description.en: The leading party group established by the Communist Party of China within the Xiamen Municipal People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 位于东亚的社会主义国家，通称中国。
description.en: A socialist state in East Asia, commonly known as China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的主要武装力量。
description.en: The principal military force of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的创始政党之一。
description.en: One of the founding political parties of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，厦门市人民政府首任市长。
description.en: Chinese politician, the first mayor of the Xiamen Municipal People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 1955年至1967年间厦门市人民政府的名称。
description.en: The name of the Xiamen Municipal People's Government between 1955 and 1967.

description.zh-cn: 1966年至1976年在中国发生的一场大规模政治运动。
description.en: A large-scale political movement that took place in China from 1966 to 1976.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命期间响应毛泽东号召“造反”的群众组织的统称。
description.en: A general term for mass organizations that responded to Mao Zedong's call to 'rebel' during the Cultural Revolution.

nodes.id: 厦门市军事管制委员会 (1967年)

zh-cn: 厦门市军事管制委员会

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命期间成立的军事管制机构，在厦门市革命委员会成立前行使权力。
description.en: A military control commission established during the Cultural Revolution, which exercised power before the establishment of the Xiamen Municipal Revolutionary Committee.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命期间厦门市的党政合一领导机构。
description.en: The unified party-government leadership body of Xiamen during the Cultural Revolution.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军福州军区

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军福州军区

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军曾在中国东南部设立的大军区。
description.en: A former military region of the People's Liberation Army located in southeastern China.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命期间福建省的党政合一领导机构。
description.en: The unified party-government leadership body of Fujian Province during the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的中央委员会，是中国共产党的最高领导机关。
description.en: The Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, the highest leading body of the CPC.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国国务院

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的最高国家行政机关。
description.en: The highest state administrative organ of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在福建省的领导机关。
description.en: The leading organ of the Communist Party of China in Fujian Province.

description.zh-cn: 中国最早实行对外开放政策的经济特区之一。
description.en: One of the first Special Economic Zones in China to implement the policy of opening up to the outside world.

nodes.id: 厦门经济特区管理委员会

description.en: The former administrative body for the Xiamen Special Economic Zone, which was abolished in 1984.

description.zh-cn: 厦门市人民政府的业务上级为福建省人民政府。
description.en: The operational superior of the Xiamen Municipal People's Government is the Fujian Provincial People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 厦门市人民政府是厦门市人民代表大会的执行机关，组织上隶属于厦门市人民代表大会。
description.en: The Xiamen Municipal People's Government is the executive organ of the Xiamen Municipal People's Congress and is organizationally subordinate to it.

relationships.target: 厦门市人民代表大会常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 厦门市人民政府的组织上级为厦门市人民代表大会常务委员会。
description.en: The organizational superior of the Xiamen Municipal People's Government is the Standing Committee of the Xiamen Municipal People's Congress.

relationships.source: 中国共产党厦门市人民政府党组
relationships.target: 中国共产党厦门市委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党厦门市人民政府党组的中共上级为中国共产党厦门市委员会。
description.en: The Party superior of the Party Leadership Group of the Xiamen Municipal People's Government is the Xiamen Municipal Committee of the Communist Party of China.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军厦门市军事管制委员会

description.zh-cn: 厦门市人民政府于1949年10月21日成立，接替中国人民解放军厦门市军事管制委员会。
description.en: The Xiamen Municipal People's Government was established on October 21, 1949, succeeding the Xiamen Military Control Commission of the Chinese People's Liberation Army.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军于1949年10月17日解放厦门。
description.en: The Chinese People's Liberation Army liberated Xiamen on October 17, 1949.

description.zh-cn: 1955年5月，厦门市人民政府改称为厦门市人民委员会。
description.en: In May 1955, the Xiamen Municipal People's Government was renamed the Xiamen Municipal People's Committee.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命开始后，厦门市人民委员会陷入瘫痪并于1967年1月被夺权。
description.en: After the start of the Cultural Revolution, the Xiamen Municipal People's Committee was paralyzed and its power was seized in January 1967.

description.zh-cn: 厦门市人民委员会在造反派的冲击下陷入瘫痪。
description.en: The Xiamen Municipal People's Committee was paralyzed under the impact of the rebel factions.

relationships.source: 厦门市军事管制委员会 (1967年)

description.zh-cn: 1967年6月18日，厦门市军事管制委员会成立，取代了已瘫痪的厦门市人民委员会。
description.en: On June 18, 1967, the Xiamen Military Control Commission was established, replacing the paralyzed Xiamen Municipal People's Committee.

relationships.target: 厦门市军事管制委员会 (1967年)

description.zh-cn: 厦门市革命委员会于1968年9月16日成立，取代了厦门市军事管制委员会。
description.en: The Xiamen Municipal Revolutionary Committee was established on September 16, 1968, succeeding the Xiamen Military Control Commission.

relationships.source: 中国人民解放军福州军区

description.zh-cn: 批准成立厦门市革命委员会。
description.en: Approved the establishment of the Xiamen Municipal Revolutionary Committee.

description.zh-cn: 批准成立厦门市革命委员会。
description.en: Approved the establishment of the Xiamen Municipal Revolutionary Committee.

description.zh-cn: 1980年5月，厦门市人民政府恢复，取代了厦门市革命委员会。
description.en: In May 1980, the Xiamen Municipal People's Government was restored, replacing the Xiamen Municipal Revolutionary Committee.

description.zh-cn: 批准关于在厦门建设经济特区的报告，同意开设厦门经济特区。
description.en: Approved the report on establishing a special economic zone in Xiamen and agreed to open the Xiamen Special Economic Zone.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国国务院

description.zh-cn: 批准关于在厦门建设经济特区的报告，同意开设厦门经济特区。
description.en: Approved the report on establishing a special economic zone in Xiamen and agreed to open the Xiamen Special Economic Zone.

description.zh-cn: 提交《关于在厦门建设经济特区的报告》并获得批准。
description.en: Submitted the 'Report on the Establishment of a Special Economic Zone in Xiamen' which was subsequently approved.

relationships.source: 厦门经济特区管理委员会

description.zh-cn: 厦门经济特区管理委员会归福建省人民政府直接领导。
description.en: The Administrative Committee of Xiamen Special Economic Zone was under the direct leadership of the Fujian Provincial People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 厦门医学院由福建省人民政府、厦门市人民政府共建，以厦门市人民政府管理为主。
description.en: Xiamen Medical College is jointly established by the Fujian Provincial People's Government and the Xiamen Municipal People's Government, with management primarily by the Xiamen Municipal People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 厦门医学院由福建省人民政府、厦门市人民政府共建。
description.en: Xiamen Medical College is jointly established by the Fujian Provincial People's Government and the Xiamen Municipal People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 厦门理工学院由福建省人民政府、厦门市人民政府共建，以厦门市人民政府管理为主。
description.en: Xiamen University of Technology is jointly established by the Fujian Provincial People's Government and the Xiamen Municipal People's Government, with management primarily by the Xiamen Municipal People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 厦门理工学院由福建省人民政府、厦门市人民政府共建。
description.en: Xiamen University of Technology is jointly established by the Fujian Provincial People's Government and the Xiamen Municipal People's Government.
